wikipedia_page.main: Norman Arthur Ough (10 November 1898 – 3 August 1965) was a marine model maker whose models of Royal Navy warships are regarded as among the very finest of warship models.

response: A model of HMS Glorious by model maker Norman A. Ough built for the Royal United Services Museum is now on display in the Fleet Air Arm Museum at RNAS Yeovilton.
A model of HMS Queen Elizabeth by Norman A. Ough is held by the National Maritime Museum.
A model of HMS Daring by Norman A. Ough is held by the National Maritime Museum.
A model of HMS Cygnet by Norman A. Ough is held by the National Maritime Museum.
